argument.description: The base to use in the power function.
The exponent to use in the power function.

description: The PostgreSQL power function returns m raised to the nth power.
sample:
postgres=# SELECT power(6, 2);
 power
-------
    36
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT power(6, -2);
       power
--------------------
 0.0277777777777778
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT power(5.4, 3);
        power
----------------------
 157.4640000000000000
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT power(0, 3);
 power
-------
     0
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT power(3, 0);
 power
-------
     1
(1 row)
